data.title: Junior Rugby 2019-20
data.text:
We hope you have all enjoyed your summer holiday and are raring to go for the new season.

West offer Junior and Midi rugby for a ages from our Micros (Pre-school to P1), our Mini Section (P2 - P7) and through to our Midi teams (S1 - U16s). The club's focus is solely on educating our players how to play this wonderful game in a skilled, safe and enjoyable manner and equip them with the tools to enjoy adult rugby for many years to come.

All of our coaches carry PVG certification and the club ensures that they progress through the various stages of coach education facilitated by the SRU in addition to the coach and player development programme operated within the club. Making use of the excellent playing facilities at Burnbrae (including our all-weather 4G pitch) we welcome all male and female players irrespective of previous experience........ it's all about having fun.

Junior training re-starts at Burnbrae on Sunday the 18th of August at 10.30am and registration and payment of the appropriate subscription can be done on-line by following the link below:

Junior Registration 2019-20

All new players are welcome to 'come and try' for the first few weeks of the season without obligation.

We look forward to welcoming all new and existing players to West for season 2019-20.
